name: SpaceShifters
description:
ICT-18 kurssi peli

A school group project game made by me, Dasnukki, Arno and AarroHTL

Use WASD to control the ship and left mouse button or space bar to shoot projectiles.

Press esc pause game

You are a space cargo pilot in the year 3422. You make your living by delivering huge amounts of cargo around the outer space. There is a lot of dangers including space monsters and asteroid belts in your way. By delivering your cargo fast, you can buy new space ships and deliver even more cargo.

Try to deliver the gargo as fast as possible.

Downloadable exe included
